title: Better Hotkey/Shortcut Integration
body: I have noticed that when using applications like screen or irssi, the hotkeys for those pieces of software do not work in bash for windows.

comments.body: I exclusively use Shift + Insert, this work in CMD but not Powershell or Bash Ubuntu on Windows. I hate both microsofts copy and paste methods. Ctrl C is an interrupt command - so I don't like doing that, and highlighting and pressing enter is horrible too because I might want to copy a dangerous command which I feel horrible having on the console and pressing enter too..
